message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to give you a 5% discount if you buy it now, but if you decline, the price will go up to $11000 in the next round.
I'll take the product at the current price, thank you!

If you're satisfied with the first product, I'm confident you'll be happy with this one as well.
